00037 class CComponentBase: virtual public IComponent
00038 {
00039 public:
00043        CComponentBase();
00044 
00045        // reimplemented (icomp::IComponent)
00046        virtual const ICompositeComponent* GetParentComponent(bool ownerOnly = false) const;
00047        virtual void* GetInterface(const istd::CClassInfo& interfaceType, const QByteArray& subId = "");
00048        virtual const IComponentContext* GetComponentContext() const;
00049        virtual void SetComponentContext(
00050                             const icomp::IComponentContext* contextPtr,
00051                             const ICompositeComponent* parentPtr,
00052                             bool isParentOwner);
00053 
00054 protected:
00059        bool IsComponentActive() const;
00060 
00061        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00062        virtual void OnComponentDestroyed();
00063 
00064        // abstract methods
00068        virtual const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& GetComponentStaticInfo() const = 0;
00069 
00070        // static methods
00071        static const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& InitStaticInfo(IComponent* componentPtr);
00072 
00073 private:
00074        const IComponentContext* m_contextPtr;
00075        const ICompositeComponent* m_parentPtr;
00076        bool m_isParentOwner;
00077 };
00078 
00079 
00080 // inline protected methods
00081 
00082 inline bool CComponentBase::IsComponentActive() const
00083 {
00084        return (m_contextPtr != NULL);
00085 }

00099 #define I_BEGIN_COMPONENT(ComponentType)\
00100        typedef ComponentType CurrentComponentType;\
00101        static const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& InitStaticInfo(ComponentType* componentPtr)\
00102        {\
00103               static icomp::TComponentStaticInfo<ComponentType> staticInfo(&BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(NULL));\
00104               static bool isStaticInitialized = false;\
00105               if (isStaticInitialized && (componentPtr == NULL)){\
00106                      return staticInfo;\
00107               }\
00108               isStaticInitialized = true;\
00109               BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(componentPtr);
00110 
00117 #define I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(ComponentType)\
00118        typedef ComponentType CurrentComponentType;\
00119        static const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& InitStaticInfo(ComponentType* componentPtr)\
00120        {\
00121               static icomp::CBaseComponentStaticInfo staticInfo(&BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(NULL));\
00122               static bool isStaticInitialized = false;\
00123               if (isStaticInitialized && (componentPtr == NULL)){\
00124                      return staticInfo;\
00125               }\
00126               isStaticInitialized = true;\
00127               BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(componentPtr);
00128 
00136 #define I_END_COMPONENT\
00137               return staticInfo;\
00138        }\
00139        virtual const icomp::IRealComponentStaticInfo& GetComponentStaticInfo() const\
00140        {\
00141               return InitStaticInfo(NULL);\
00142        }

00423 template <class Dest>
00424 Dest* CompCastPtr(istd::IPolymorphic* objectPtr)
00425 {
00426        const icomp::IComponent* componentPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::IComponent*>(objectPtr);
00427        if (componentPtr != NULL){
00428               icomp::ICompositeComponent* parentComponentPtr = const_cast<icomp::ICompositeComponent*>(componentPtr->GetParentComponent(true));
00429 
00430               if (parentComponentPtr != NULL){
00431                      Dest* retVal = (Dest*)parentComponentPtr->GetInterface(istd::CClassInfo(typeid(Dest)));
00432 
00433                      if (retVal != NULL){
00434                             return retVal;
00435                      }
00436               }
00437        }
00438 
00439        return dynamic_cast<Dest*>(objectPtr);
00440 }
00441 
00442 
00448 template <class Dest>
00449 const Dest* CompCastPtr(const istd::IPolymorphic* objectPtr)
00450 {
00451        const icomp::IComponent* componentPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::IComponent*>(objectPtr);
00452        if (componentPtr != NULL){
00453               icomp::ICompositeComponent* parentComponentPtr = const_cast<icomp::ICompositeComponent*>(componentPtr->GetParentComponent(true));
00454 
00455               if (parentComponentPtr != NULL){
00456                      const Dest* retVal = (const Dest*)parentComponentPtr->GetInterface(istd::CClassInfo(typeid(Dest)));
00457 
00458                      if (retVal != NULL){
00459                             return retVal;
00460                      }
00461               }
00462        }
00463 
00464        return dynamic_cast<const Dest*>(objectPtr);
00465 }
